casebody.data:
PEOPLE
v.
MERAZ S253629 Supreme Court of California. MARCH 27, 2019

Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar, Kruger and Groban, JJ.

The petitions for review are granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending consideration and disposition of a related issue in People v. Perez, S248730 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ), or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
